name: Gem of Destruction
description: Gem of Destruction takes you on a wild adventure through a secluded dangerous jungle, in an attempt to recover a stolen powerful gem from the evil King Joe.  Kyle lives an ordinary uneventful life on a daily and nothing exciting ever happens to him. He always imaged himself living the life and dream of being a secret Agent saving the world and he is about to get his chance. What starts out as a regular end to his day with a reading one of his best stories what is about to happen to him is way far beyond his imagination. He is about to live out his wildest dream but is he ready for it.
